name: conversations.listConnectInvites
desc: Lists shared channel invites that have been generated or received but have not been approved by all parties

team_id.desc: Encoded team id for the workspace to retrieve invites for, required if org token is used.

cursor.desc: Set to next_cursor returned by previous call to list items in subsequent page.

errors.invalid_arguments: An invalid argument was supplied to the method.
errors.restricted_action: A team preference prevents the authenticated user from viewing shared channel invites.
